name: Piggy Bank's Adventure - LD44
description:
Piggy Bank and his family were living on Pig-Island without worrying about he future. Each day was better than the previous, and they all lived together as a happy family.

But those peaceful times suddenly ended when the evil Greedy Boar stole all coins of Piggy Mother and Piggy Father. 

It's now up to Piggy Bank to reclaim the honor of his family by getting back the stolen coins and defeat Greedy Boar
